contentfulLocationPage.heading: Curitiba
contentfulLocationPage.firstEntrySubtitle: One of the 10 greenest cities in the world

content.value: Curitiba, the capital of Paraná, Brazil and one of the 10 greenest cities in the world, is heading to become the Brazilian Center for technology and development. Surfing the wave of the 4th Industrial Revolution, the idea to share new skills like coding and data science has never been so important and our team is glad to grant our community of people from different backgrounds this knowledge.

contentfulLocationPage.secondEntrySubtitle: A leading innovator in an increasingly connected and collaborative world

content.value: Brazilians set great store by the relationship building that sustains such collaborative enterprises as Apple’s iPhone, most of whose innovative apps are written by external developers. They are also enthusiastic adopters of the disruptive digital technologies that, by enabling “default to open” (the term coined by Google to describe how to leverage the creative potential of the crowd), are driving faster, more cost-effective innovation. And the country’s embrace of connectivity—Brazil has the world’s third-largest number of Facebook users, many of them small businesses and startups—constitutes a critical asset as technology-driven networks reshape the global innovation landscape.

We will offer the Digital Shaper Program: During the 6-month program in Data Science, Web Development or Artificial Intelligence our participants work on online courses, take part in community events, learn from interesting workshops with our corporate partners and develop their hands-on coding projects to deepen their digital skills. We from TechLabs Curitiba are wishful to get to know you in our self-developed and knowledge-shared community - Take part!
